caption: In a pitch-black place, a boy and a girl shared a passionate kiss. Outside the castle, a group of stone soldiers stood in formation. The bald evil character observed everything. The protective barrier of the castle was crumbling. A bridge collapsed, causing many to fall. Stone soldiers clashed with a horde of monsters. Flames lit up the castle's interior. The wizards ran about, wielding their wands. Our male protagonist, in a critical moment, shared a kiss with his beloved girl. Quickly, he arrived in a hall that was collapsing. They reached a room filled with items, where they encountered three malicious individuals. The trio pointed their wands, attempting to provoke a confrontation.
